duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the LawHelp team and provide strategic direction and management for LawHelpCA, including site maintenance, research on design best practices, and conducting user testing.
Supervise and provide support for holding LAAC conferences, online trainings, project management, and professional development.
Manage cross-program LAAC projects, including maintaining the CA Pleading Bank and LAAC Directory, and overseeing organizational data analytics and reporting.
Contribute to LAAC's organizational mission and goals by actively participating in internal committees, meetings, and activities.
Perform other related duties as assigned to meet the ongoing needs of the organization.

education_certification.credential: Licensed California attorney in good standing. Bachelor's degree in Law (Master's preferred).
